plot: A man awakens in an abandoned warehouse tied up, frightened, and confused. His mysterious captor reveals why he abducted him and why he has less than five minutes to live.
title: Eye for an Eye
plot_es: A man awakens in an abandoned warehouse tied up, frightened, and confused. His mysterious captor reveals why he abducted him and why he has less than five minutes to live.
plot_en: A man awakens in an abandoned warehouse tied up, frightened, and confused. His mysterious captor reveals why he abducted him and why he has less than five minutes to live.
